snippet: Venezuela has permitted American diplomats to meet with Timothy Tracy, a California filmmaker awaiting trial on charges of espionage and fomenting unrest.
abstract: Venezuela allows American diplomats to meet with Timothy Tracy, California filmmaker awaiting trial on charges of espionage and fomenting unrest.
lead_paragraph: Venezuela has permitted American diplomats to meet with Timothy Tracy, a California filmmaker awaiting trial on charges of espionage and fomenting unrest.

headline.seo: Venezuela: Detained American Is Allowed Visitors
headline.main: Venezuela: Detained American Is Allowed Visitors
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: U.S. Man Is Allowed Visitors
